name: FullTurn Media Inc.
tag_list: video, health, professionals, content, information, education
overview: FullTurn Media, Inc. produces expert video content under the illumistream brand in high value genres including Medical & Healthcare, Diet & Nutrition, Fitness & Exercise, and Beauty. illumistream videos feature leading professionals who provide valuable and relevant expert information in an engaging format, designed specifically to appeal to the consumer audience.
